articles.title: Court puts reinstatement of cannabis commission head on hold
articles.description:
A judge ruled that the fired chair of the Cannabis Control Commission must be reinstated, but the state filed an appeal to halt the order for a week.

The post Court puts reinstatement of cannabis commission head on hold appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A judge ruled to reinstate Cannabis Control Commission chair, but state appeals.
The appeal halts the reinstatement order for one week, affecting commission operations.
Boston residents may face delays in cannabis regulation and licensing processes.
